strapiJob.title: HVAC Maintenance Trainee
strapiJob.description:
We are looking for a HVAC Service Trainee to join our team! This is a great opportunity to start a rewarding career in HVAC.

What you’ll be doing: 

  • Learn how to perform maintenance and repair tasks on heating, air conditioning and ventilation systems for customers. This will include both technical and customer service skills.
  • Attend daily training with the training supervisor both in classroom and on jobsites.
  • Learn to perform routine maintenance tasks on HVAC equipment such as checking refrigerant systems, electrical components, replacing filters, cleaning system components, basic trouble shooting.
  • Utilize a variety of hand tools, power tools, and industry specific equipment such as refrigerant gauges, electrical meters, torches, refrigerant recovery machines, etc.
  • Learn to evaluate performance of HVAC equipment.
  • Learn to correctly document all phases of work including work order notes, invoice notes, truck stock sheets, checklists.
  • Learn to effectively use all software and technology Paschal uses for field technicians.
  • Learn the specific guideline that Paschal uses for interacting with customers.
  • Complete all work in a safe manner.

Successful Candidate Must Possess the Following Qualifications:

  • Possession of a valid driver’s license and good driving record.
  • Possess great mechanical aptitude.
  • Strong ability to read and understand technical instructions.
  • Ability to explain technical information to customers.
  • Computer Knowledge.
  • Must be able to adapt to changing and growing work environment.
  • Must be clean, maintain a professional appearance, and communicate well with customers.
  • Excellent communication (written and verbal) and listening skills.
  • Be a self-motivated team player.
  • Detail oriented.
  • Troubleshooting ability

What you’ll love about working for us:

We are serious about maintaining our team-oriented culture centered on our Customers, our Employees, and the Company in that order - while having a lot of fun doing it

  • Enjoy a brand new, centrally located, award-winning facility in NWA
  • Work with experienced and forward-thinking creative professionals
  • Healthcare, vacation, retirement savings and other benefits available

Successful candidates:

. . . want to build something with us. You’re highly motivated and can work easily and effectively in teams as well as independently.  You are punctual, professional, a great listener, recorder, and communicator, and genuinely want to help others. 

We hope to welcome You aboard. Paschal will provide you with a full job description upon acceptance for an interview.

Please complete application at: www.gopaschal.com
